title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, June 7, 2021
description: “Writers don’t write from experience … If you wrote from experience, you’d get maybe one book, maybe three poems. Writers write from empathy.” -- Nikki Giovanni (1943)
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Writers don’t write from experience … If you wrote from experience, you’d get maybe one book, maybe three poems. Writers write from empathy.” -- Nikki Giovanni (1943)
